content: Yes! Camping is a big part of the Party in the Paddock experience with a range of camping options available for festival-goers, including general camping, glamping, and camper van sites. The festival provides various facilities and amenities including showers, toilets, and water refill stations. It is important to note that camping tickets are sold separately from general admission tickets, and it's essential to book in advance as camping spots tend to fill up quickly.
